data.name: Infanticide | インファンティサイド
data.detailed_description:
【Distribution of this product ended on July 29, 2022】

Infanticide is a horror walking simulator set in Japan.
It's a short horror game. The play time is assumed to be about 0.5 to 1 hour.

■Story

"Take a closer look.
There are children waiting for you.
If you find suspected child abuse, please call us immediately."

■Feature

  • hard puzzle, walking simulator
  • Realistic japan house design
  • Unlike "Alice | 愛莉澄", Infanticide is not an action game.
  • One ending
  • Psychological horror
  • Gray Scale,Motion blur enabled

■Controll


Walk：WASD
Zoom：right click
Light：left click
Look：mouse
Option：Esc

■Notes

  • There are situations where keyboard operation is required. Please bring a keyboard.

data.reviews:

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows10
  • Processor: Intel(R) Core(TM) i5
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Intel(R) UHD Graphics620
  • DirectX: Version 12
  • Storage: 1 GB available space
  • Additional Notes: Please wear headphones and use keyboard
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Windows10
  • Processor: Ryzen5 2600X
  • Memory: 16 GB RAM
  • Graphics: GTX(R) 1660 SUPER
  • DirectX: Version 12
  • Storage: 1 GB available space
  • Additional Notes: Please wear headphones and use keyboard

content_descriptors.notes: Includes depictions reminiscent of child abuse.
